label: [{"start":0,"end":6,"text":"鸡大肠杆菌病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":10,"end":20,"text":"致病性血清型大肠杆菌","labels":["disease"]},{"start":26,"end":27,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 鸡大肠杆菌病是由某些致病性血清型大肠杆菌引起的各日龄鸡均可发生的不同类型疾病的总称。

label: [{"start":7,"end":10,"text":"心包炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":11,"end":14,"text":"肝周炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":15,"end":18,"text":"气囊炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":19,"end":22,"text":"腹膜炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":23,"end":27,"text":"输卵管炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":28,"end":31,"text":"滑膜炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":32,"end":40,"text":"大肠杆菌性肉芽肿","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":41,"end":44,"text":"败血症","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":45,"end":47,"text":"肠炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":48,"end":51,"text":"心肌炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":52,"end":54,"text":"眼炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":55,"end":58,"text":"关节炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":59,"end":61,"text":"脐炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":62,"end":64,"text":"肺炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":65,"end":68,"text":"卵巢炎","labels":["pathology"]}]
text: 患病时，可引起心包炎、肝周炎、气囊炎、腹膜炎、输卵管炎、滑膜炎、大肠杆菌性肉芽肿、败血症、肠炎、心肌炎、眼炎、关节炎、脐炎、肺炎、卵巢炎等病变。

label: [{"start":44,"end":48,"text":"肠炎下痢","labels":["pathology"]}]
text: 由于日龄的不同，其易感性不同，其表现形式多样，如2~7日龄易感，多是由于垂直传播所致，以肠炎下痢为主；

label: [{"start":14,"end":17,"text":"新城疫","labels":["disease"]},{"start":18,"end":25,"text":"传染性支气管炎","labels":["disease"]},{"start":29,"end":32,"text":"气囊炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":57,"end":60,"text":"肝周炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":61,"end":64,"text":"心包炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":65,"end":68,"text":"气囊炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":69,"end":72,"text":"腹膜炎","labels":["pathology"]}]
text: 15～20日龄易感，多是由于新城疫和传染性支气管炎诱发，以气囊炎为主：25～35日龄，多是由于卫生管理不善引起，以肝周炎、心包炎、气囊炎、腹膜炎多见。

label: [{"start":11,"end":14,"text":"卵巢炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":15,"end":19,"text":"输卵管炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":20,"end":26,"text":"卵黄性腹膜炎","labels":["pathology"]}]
text: 产蛋期也容易并发或继发卵巢炎、输卵管炎、卵黄性腹膜炎。

label: [{"start":30,"end":33,"text":"漂白粉","labels":["drug"]},{"start":34,"end":38,"text":"次氯酸钠","labels":["drug"]},{"start":39,"end":46,"text":"二氯异氰尿酸钠","labels":["drug"]},{"start":52,"end":55,"text":"石炭酸","labels":["drug"]},{"start":58,"end":61,"text":"来苏儿","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 具有中等抵抗力，60℃30分钟可杀死，对氯十分敏感，所以常用漂白粉、次氯酸钠、二氯异氰尿酸钠等消毒，5%石炭酸、3%来苏儿、5分钟也可杀死。

label: [{"start":4,"end":10,"text":"抗生素类药物","labels":["drug"]},{"start":11,"end":14,"text":"磺胺脒","labels":["drug"]},{"start":15,"end":18,"text":"链霉素","labels":["drug"]},{"start":19,"end":22,"text":"红霉素","labels":["drug"]},{"start":23,"end":27,"text":"庆大霉素","labels":["drug"]},{"start":28,"end":32,"text":"卡那霉素","labels":["drug"]},{"start":33,"end":36,"text":"新霉素","labels":["drug"]},{"start":37,"end":41,"text":"多黏菌素","labels":["drug"]},{"start":42,"end":45,"text":"金霉素","labels":["drug"]},{"start":46,"end":50,"text":"奇放霉素","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 其敏感的抗生素类药物有磺胺脒、链霉素、红霉素、庆大霉素、卡那霉素、新霉素、多黏菌素、金霉素、奇放霉素等。

label: [{"start":6,"end":9,"text":"抗菌药","labels":["drug"]},{"start":23,"end":29,"text":"鸡大肠杆菌病","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 近年来，由于抗菌药的滥用，使其耐药菌株增多，使鸡大肠杆菌病呈蔓延之势。

label: [{"start":19,"end":27,"text":"保持一定血药浓度","labels":["control"]},{"start":29,"end":33,"text":"及时换药","labels":["control"]}]
text: 本菌易形成耐药性，所以治疗、预防用量要保持一定血药浓度，并及时换药。

label: [{"start":7,"end":9,"text":"肠道","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 本菌又是体表和肠道中常在菌，因此，对鸡场养殖全程都构成威胁。

label: [{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"肠道","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":4,"end":8,"text":"大肠杆菌","labels":["disease"]},{"start":9,"end":11,"text":"粪便","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 肠道中的大肠杆菌随粪便排出体外，污染周围环境、饲料、饮水、垫料、用具和空气。

label: [{"start":5,"end":7,"text":"粪便","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":14,"end":16,"text":"卵巢","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":17,"end":20,"text":"输卵管","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":36,"end":40,"text":"隐性感染","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":51,"end":55,"text":"显性感染","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":33,"end":35,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":67,"end":71,"text":"健康雏鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 还可以通过粪便污染蛋壳或感染卵巢、输卵管而进入蛋内，带菌种蛋孵出的雏鸡为隐性感染，条件恶劣时，则发展为显性感染；并可以水平传播方式感染健康雏鸡。

label: [{"start":0,"end":3,"text":"消化道","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":4,"end":7,"text":"呼吸道","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 消化道、呼吸道是感染门户，交配也可造成传染。

label: [{"start":26,"end":32,"text":"鸡大肠杆菌病","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 环境不卫生，过冷、过热或温差大(大于2℃)时，可促进鸡大肠杆菌病的发生。

label: [{"start":0,"end":3,"text":"球虫病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":4,"end":10,"text":"鸡大肠杆菌病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":23,"end":25,"text":"球虫","labels":["disease"]},{"start":87,"end":90,"text":"败血症","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":25,"end":34,"text":"破坏肠黏膜上皮细胞","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":36,"end":47,"text":"肠黏膜的完整性遭到破坏","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":48,"end":54,"text":"失去屏障机能","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":27,"end":34,"text":"肠黏膜上皮细胞","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":36,"end":39,"text":"肠黏膜","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":63,"end":66,"text":"肠黏膜","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":68,"end":72,"text":"毛细血管","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":75,"end":79,"text":"血液循环","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 球虫病在鸡大肠杆菌病的发生上具有重要意义，因为球虫破坏肠黏膜上皮细胞，使肠黏膜的完整性遭到破坏，失去屏障机能，本菌则通过受损的肠黏膜侵入毛细血管，进入血液循环，分布到全身而呈败血症的过程。

label: [{"start":0,"end":6,"text":"鸡大肠杆菌病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":24,"end":27,"text":"肉仔鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 鸡大肠杆菌病一年四季均可发生，但以冬、夏季多发，肉仔鸡最易感。

label: [{"start":0,"end":6,"text":"鸡大肠杆菌病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":13,"end":17,"text":"支原体病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":18,"end":21,"text":"禽霍乱","labels":["disease"]},{"start":22,"end":29,"text":"传染性支气管炎","labels":["disease"]},{"start":30,"end":33,"text":"新城疫","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 鸡大肠杆菌病常继发或并发于支原体病、禽霍乱、传染性支气管炎、新城疫等疾病，有时相互促进，使死亡率提高。

label: [{"start":8,"end":16,"text":"急性败血症病原菌","labels":["disease"]},{"start":23,"end":25,"text":"血液","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":30,"end":34,"text":"器官组织","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":28,"end":38,"text":"全身器官组织广泛出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":36,"end":38,"text":"出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":39,"end":43,"text":"急性死亡","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":50,"end":53,"text":"眼球炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":54,"end":58,"text":"输卵管炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":59,"end":62,"text":"滑膜炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":63,"end":66,"text":"脊髓炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":68,"end":70,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":70,"end":74,"text":"精神不振","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":75,"end":80,"text":"采食量减少","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":81,"end":83,"text":"腹泻","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":84,"end":94,"text":"拉黄白色或黄绿色稀粪","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":85,"end":88,"text":"黄白色","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":89,"end":92,"text":"黄绿色","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":95,"end":99,"text":"呼吸困难","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":102,"end":106,"text":"衰竭而死","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":93,"end":94,"text":"粪","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: (三)症状：1.急性败血症病原菌从损伤部位侵入血液，引起全身器官组织广泛出血而急性死亡，不死者可引发眼球炎、输卵管炎、滑膜炎、脊髓炎等，病鸡精神不振，采食量减少，腹泻，拉黄白色或黄绿色稀粪，呼吸困难，最后衰竭而死。

label: [{"start":2,"end":6,"text":"雏鸡脐炎","labels":["disease"]},{"start":8,"end":11,"text":"大肛脐","labels":["disease"]},{"start":20,"end":22,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":26,"end":28,"text":"弱雏","labels":["type"]},{"start":36,"end":39,"text":"脐带炎","labels":["pathology"]}]
text: 2.雏鸡脐炎俗称大肛脐。带菌的种蛋孵出的雏鸡不死也是弱雏，一般在一周内因脐带炎而死亡。

label: [{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"病雏","labels":["type"]},{"start":4,"end":8,"text":"精神委顿","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":9,"end":13,"text":"羽毛蓬乱","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":11,"end":13,"text":"蓬乱","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":14,"end":18,"text":"翅膀下垂","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":16,"end":18,"text":"下垂","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":19,"end":23,"text":"闭目呆立","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":24,"end":26,"text":"不食","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":27,"end":32,"text":"呈昏睡状态","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":33,"end":37,"text":"腹部膨大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":35,"end":37,"text":"膨大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":38,"end":42,"text":"脐部红肿","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":40,"end":42,"text":"红肿","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":45,"end":47,"text":"破溃","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":9,"end":11,"text":"羽毛","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":14,"end":16,"text":"翅膀","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":20,"end":21,"text":"目","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":33,"end":35,"text":"腹部","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":38,"end":40,"text":"脐部","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 病雏表现精神委顿，羽毛蓬乱，翅膀下垂，闭目呆立，不食，呈昏睡状态，腹部膨大，脐部红肿，有的破溃，多在2～3天死亡。

label: [{"start":2,"end":9,"text":"气囊炎大肠杆菌","labels":["disease"]},{"start":29,"end":33,"text":"大肠杆菌","labels":["disease"]},{"start":64,"end":67,"text":"气囊炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":53,"end":55,"text":"气囊","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":44,"end":46,"text":"鸡体","labels":["type"]}]
text: 3.气囊炎大肠杆菌在自然界中广泛存在，其中鸡舍内空气尘埃中大肠杆菌的含量每克约10万个，鸡体呼吸时直接进入气囊，并定居繁殖，引起气囊炎。

label: [{"start":7,"end":12,"text":"呼吸道黏膜","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":13,"end":17,"text":"大肠杆菌","labels":["disease"]},{"start":30,"end":33,"text":"气囊炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":46,"end":48,"text":"肺炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":49,"end":52,"text":"胸膜炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":53,"end":56,"text":"心包炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":57,"end":60,"text":"肝周炎","labels":["pathology"]}]
text: 另外，受损伤的呼吸道黏膜对大肠杆菌的侵入十分敏感，由此引起的气囊炎可扩散至相邻组织，常见的有肺炎、胸膜炎、心包炎、肝周炎等。

label: [{"start":2,"end":5,"text":"新城疫","labels":["disease"]},{"start":6,"end":10,"text":"支原体病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":11,"end":18,"text":"传染性支气管炎","labels":["disease"]},{"start":19,"end":23,"text":"呼吸道病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":28,"end":36,"text":"大肠杆菌性气囊炎","labels":["disease"]},{"start":58,"end":63,"text":"呼吸道症状","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":58,"end":61,"text":"呼吸道","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":66,"end":70,"text":"呼吸啰音","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":71,"end":73,"text":"咳嗽","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":74,"end":78,"text":"呼吸困难","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":79,"end":83,"text":"食欲减少","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":84,"end":88,"text":"逐渐消瘦","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":89,"end":95,"text":"生长发育受阻","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":99,"end":104,"text":"心包炎严重","labels":["pathology"]}]
text: 当患新城疫、支原体病和传染性支气管炎等呼吸道病时，可继发大肠杆菌性气囊炎，使病情加重，死亡率增高，临床上表现有明显的呼吸道症状，可见呼吸啰音、咳嗽、呼吸困难、食欲减少，逐渐消瘦、生长发育受阻，有时因心包炎严重而突然死亡。

label: [{"start":2,"end":6,"text":"全眼球炎","labels":["disease"]},{"start":10,"end":13,"text":"败血症","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":32,"end":36,"text":"眼皮肿胀","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":34,"end":36,"text":"肿胀","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":37,"end":39,"text":"流泪","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":40,"end":42,"text":"闭眼","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":43,"end":51,"text":"眼内有脓性分泌物","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":52,"end":56,"text":"角膜混浊","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":54,"end":56,"text":"混浊","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":32,"end":34,"text":"眼皮","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":41,"end":42,"text":"眼","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":43,"end":44,"text":"眼","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":52,"end":54,"text":"角膜","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":46,"end":51,"text":"脓性分泌物","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":60,"end":62,"text":"失明","labels":["pathology"]}]
text: 4.全眼球炎本症多由败血症引起，多发生于一侧，也有两侧的，表现为眼皮肿胀、流泪、闭眼，眼内有脓性分泌物，角膜混浊，严重时失明。

label: [{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":2,"end":6,"text":"精神不振","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":7,"end":11,"text":"采食困难","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":12,"end":16,"text":"不爱活动","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":19,"end":23,"text":"衰竭死亡","labels":["symptom"]}]
text: 病鸡精神不振，采食困难，不爱活动，最后衰竭死亡。

label: [{"start":31,"end":34,"text":"滑膜炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":37,"end":39,"text":"肿胀","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":40,"end":42,"text":"跛行","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":20,"end":23,"text":"病原菌","labels":["disease"]},{"start":2,"end":5,"text":"关节炎","labels":["disease"]},{"start":7,"end":10,"text":"败血症","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":25,"end":29,"text":"腿部关节","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 5.关节炎常为败血症的后遗症，主要是由于病原菌侵害腿部关节发生滑膜炎，引起肿胀，跛行。

label: [{"start":3,"end":12,"text":"跗关节和趾关节肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":10,"end":12,"text":"肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":19,"end":21,"text":"水疱","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":22,"end":24,"text":"脓疱","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":3,"end":6,"text":"跗关节","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":7,"end":10,"text":"趾关节","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 多见于跗关节和趾关节肿大，有大小不一的水疱和脓疱。

label: [{"start":2,"end":10,"text":"大肠杆菌性肉芽肿","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":16,"end":20,"text":"慢性经过","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":47,"end":56,"text":"粟粒大的肉芽肿结节","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":22,"end":24,"text":"心脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":25,"end":28,"text":"肠系膜","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":29,"end":31,"text":"胰脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":32,"end":34,"text":"肝脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":35,"end":37,"text":"肠管","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 6.大肠杆菌性肉芽肿多为散发，呈慢性经过，以心脏、肠系膜、胰脏、肝脏、肠管多发，可见这些器官有粟粒大的肉芽肿结节；

label: [{"start":12,"end":18,"text":"粒性细胞增生","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":16,"end":18,"text":"增生","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":19,"end":21,"text":"浸润","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":22,"end":28,"text":"呈油脂状肥厚","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":2,"end":5,"text":"肠系膜","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":7,"end":11,"text":"淋巴细胞","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":12,"end":16,"text":"粒性细胞","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 有时肠系膜由于淋巴细胞、粒性细胞增生、浸润而呈油脂状肥厚。

label: [{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"结节","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":6,"end":9,"text":"黄白色","labels":["pathology"]}]
text: 结节的切面呈黄白色，略显放射状、环状波纹或多层性。

label: [{"start":2,"end":4,"text":"脑炎","labels":["disease"]},{"start":5,"end":10,"text":"大肠杆菌病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":26,"end":30,"text":"神经症状","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":31,"end":33,"text":"蹲伏","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":34,"end":36,"text":"垂头","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":37,"end":39,"text":"闭眼","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":40,"end":42,"text":"昏睡","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":45,"end":47,"text":"歪头","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":48,"end":50,"text":"扭脖","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":51,"end":55,"text":"共济失调","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":56,"end":60,"text":"不能站立","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":61,"end":66,"text":"常一侧倒地","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":67,"end":69,"text":"抽搐","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":70,"end":74,"text":"最后死亡","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":35,"end":36,"text":"头","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":38,"end":39,"text":"眼","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":46,"end":47,"text":"头","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":49,"end":50,"text":"脖","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 7.脑炎是大肠杆菌病近几年出现的新表现型，主要表现为神经症状，蹲伏、垂头、闭眼、昏睡，有的歪头、扭脖、共济失调、不能站立，常一侧倒地、抽搐、最后死亡。

label: [{"start":6,"end":9,"text":"脊髓炎","labels":["disease"]},{"start":1,"end":4,"text":"败血症","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":16,"end":20,"text":"神经症状","labels":["pathology"]}]
text: 由败血症引起脊髓炎后也出现相应的神经症状。

label: [{"start":2,"end":5,"text":"皮肤炎","labels":["disease"]},{"start":18,"end":22,"text":"皮肤发炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":20,"end":22,"text":"发炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":23,"end":25,"text":"坏死","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":26,"end":28,"text":"溃烂","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":31,"end":37,"text":"形成紫黑色痂","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":33,"end":36,"text":"紫黑色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":18,"end":20,"text":"皮肤","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":39,"end":44,"text":"葡萄球菌病","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 8.皮肤炎也是新出现的表现型，表现为皮肤发炎、坏死、溃烂，最后形成紫黑色痂，似葡萄球菌病。

label: [{"start":2,"end":8,"text":"种鸡输卵管炎","labels":["disease"]},{"start":9,"end":12,"text":"腹膜炎","labels":["disease"]},{"start":14,"end":17,"text":"败血症","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":53,"end":57,"text":"大肚子鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":60,"end":62,"text":"裆鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":26,"end":30,"text":"精神沉郁","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":31,"end":35,"text":"饮食减少","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":36,"end":40,"text":"逐渐消瘦","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":41,"end":45,"text":"产蛋停止","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":46,"end":50,"text":"腹部膨大","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":46,"end":48,"text":"腹部","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":48,"end":50,"text":"膨大","labels":["symptom"]}]
text: 9.种鸡输卵管炎和腹膜炎是由败血症引起，临床上表现为精神沉郁，饮食减少，逐渐消瘦，产蛋停止，腹部膨大，变成大肚子鸡，俗称裆鸡。

label: [{"start":0,"end":4,"text":"初生雏鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":5,"end":7,"text":"下痢","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":16,"end":23,"text":"卵黄吸收不完全","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":24,"end":31,"text":"肠道卡他性炎症","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":32,"end":36,"text":"肝脏肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":34,"end":36,"text":"肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":38,"end":49,"text":"表面有散在的黄色坏死灶","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":50,"end":55,"text":"肝包膜增厚","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":53,"end":55,"text":"增厚","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":26,"end":31,"text":"卡他性炎症","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":24,"end":26,"text":"肠道","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":32,"end":34,"text":"肝脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":50,"end":53,"text":"肝包膜","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":44,"end":46,"text":"黄色","labels":["pathology"]}]
text: 初生雏鸡以下痢为主要症状时，可见卵黄吸收不完全，肠道卡他性炎症，肝脏肿大，其表面有散在的黄色坏死灶，肝包膜增厚；

label: [{"start":0,"end":4,"text":"心包膜炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":5,"end":10,"text":"心包膜增厚","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":8,"end":10,"text":"增厚","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":11,"end":21,"text":"心包腔积有淡黄色液体","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":16,"end":19,"text":"淡黄色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":5,"end":8,"text":"心包膜","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":11,"end":14,"text":"心包腔","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 心包膜炎，心包膜增厚，心包腔积有淡黄色液体。

label: [{"start":2,"end":4,"text":"脐炎","labels":["disease"]},{"start":7,"end":15,"text":"脐孔周围皮肤水肿","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":13,"end":15,"text":"水肿","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":16,"end":20,"text":"皮下瘀血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":18,"end":20,"text":"瘀血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":21,"end":23,"text":"出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":24,"end":26,"text":"水肿","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":16,"end":18,"text":"皮下","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":7,"end":13,"text":"脐孔周围皮肤","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 发生脐炎时可见脐孔周围皮肤水肿，皮下瘀血、出血、水肿。

label: [{"start":0,"end":3,"text":"成年鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":7,"end":10,"text":"卵巢炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":11,"end":15,"text":"输卵管炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":16,"end":20,"text":"黏膜充血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":18,"end":20,"text":"充血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":21,"end":34,"text":"管腔内充满干酪样恶臭分泌物","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":26,"end":34,"text":"干酪样恶臭分泌物","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":38,"end":44,"text":"卵黄性腹膜炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":45,"end":58,"text":"腹腔内有蛋黄液布满肠道表面","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":63,"end":67,"text":"腹膜粗糙","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":65,"end":67,"text":"粗糙","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":70,"end":73,"text":"肠粘连","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":71,"end":73,"text":"粘连","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":16,"end":18,"text":"黏膜","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":21,"end":23,"text":"管腔","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":45,"end":47,"text":"腹腔","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":54,"end":58,"text":"肠道表面","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":63,"end":65,"text":"腹膜","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":70,"end":71,"text":"肠","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 成年鸡多表现为卵巢炎、输卵管炎，黏膜充血，管腔内充满干酪样恶臭分泌物，常见有卵黄性腹膜炎，腹腔内有蛋黄液布满肠道表面，甚至见到腹膜粗糙，发生肠粘连。

label: [{"start":3,"end":10,"text":"肝包膜炎性增厚","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":6,"end":10,"text":"炎性增厚","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":11,"end":16,"text":"肝脏呈绿色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":14,"end":16,"text":"绿色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":20,"end":25,"text":"白色坏死灶","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":26,"end":29,"text":"出血点","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":30,"end":33,"text":"出血斑","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":34,"end":38,"text":"脾脏肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":36,"end":38,"text":"肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":39,"end":41,"text":"质软","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":42,"end":44,"text":"充血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":20,"end":22,"text":"白色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":3,"end":6,"text":"肝包膜","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":11,"end":13,"text":"肝脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":34,"end":36,"text":"脾脏","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 此外，肝包膜炎性增厚，肝脏呈绿色，常见有白色坏死灶、出血点、出血斑；脾脏肿大、质软、充血；

label: [{"start":0,"end":4,"text":"肾脏肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":2,"end":4,"text":"肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":5,"end":7,"text":"充血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":12,"end":21,"text":"输尿管有尿酸盐沉积","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":16,"end":21,"text":"尿酸盐沉积","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"肾脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":8,"end":11,"text":"肾小管","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":12,"end":15,"text":"输尿管","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 肾脏肿大、充血，肾小管、输尿管有尿酸盐沉积；

label: [{"start":1,"end":6,"text":"呼吸道感染","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":1,"end":4,"text":"呼吸道","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":10,"end":15,"text":"气囊炎病变","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":17,"end":22,"text":"混浊渗出物","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":23,"end":28,"text":"气囊壁增厚","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":26,"end":28,"text":"增厚","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":29,"end":43,"text":"气囊内有大小不等的干酪样团块","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":38,"end":43,"text":"干酪样团块","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":23,"end":26,"text":"气囊壁","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":29,"end":31,"text":"气囊","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 经呼吸道感染时，常见气囊炎病变，有混浊渗出物，气囊壁增厚，气囊内有大小不等的干酪样团块；

label: [{"start":0,"end":7,"text":"大肠杆菌性肠炎","labels":["disease"]},{"start":11,"end":13,"text":"肠道","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":21,"end":25,"text":"黏膜充血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":23,"end":25,"text":"充血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":26,"end":28,"text":"出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":29,"end":33,"text":"黏膜增厚","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":31,"end":33,"text":"增厚","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":21,"end":23,"text":"黏膜","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":29,"end":31,"text":"黏膜","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 大肠杆菌性肠炎时，可见肠道上1/3～1/2黏膜充血、出血，黏膜增厚；

label: [{"start":0,"end":3,"text":"滑膜炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":4,"end":7,"text":"关节炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":11,"end":13,"text":"腱鞘","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":14,"end":18,"text":"关节肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":16,"end":18,"text":"肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":14,"end":16,"text":"关节","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 滑膜炎、关节炎时，可见腱鞘、关节肿大。

label: [{"start":0,"end":8,"text":"大肠杆菌性肉芽肿","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":13,"end":22,"text":"肠道和肝脏发生结节","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":20,"end":22,"text":"结节","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":13,"end":15,"text":"肠道","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":16,"end":18,"text":"肝脏","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 大肠杆菌性肉芽肿时，可见沿肠道和肝脏发生结节，状似结核。

label: [{"start":6,"end":7,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":9,"end":16,"text":"单侧眼前房积脓","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":14,"end":16,"text":"积脓","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":11,"end":14,"text":"眼前房","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 有时可见个别鸡出现单侧眼前房积脓。

label: [{"start":3,"end":9,"text":"鸡大肠杆菌病","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 总之，鸡大肠杆菌病症状多样，病变复杂，诊断时应仔细分辨，找出发病原因和机理。

label: [{"start":2,"end":6,"text":"大肠杆菌","labels":["disease"]},{"start":14,"end":15,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":15,"end":17,"text":"心血","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":18,"end":19,"text":"肝","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":20,"end":21,"text":"脾","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":22,"end":23,"text":"肠","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":40,"end":44,"text":"大肠杆菌","labels":["disease"]},{"start":45,"end":53,"text":"革兰氏阴性短杆菌","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 1.大肠杆菌形态观察无菌钩取鸡心血或肝、脾及肠内容物直接涂片，革兰氏染色，镜检，大肠杆菌为革兰氏阴性短杆菌。

label: [{"start":10,"end":13,"text":"病死鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":13,"end":14,"text":"肝","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":15,"end":16,"text":"脾","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 2.增菌培养无菌采取病死鸡肝、脾适量，于无菌乳钵中研磨细碎，以普通肉汤作10倍稀释混合均匀，取混悬液10毫升接种于10毫升煌绿一麦康凯肉汤增菌液中，在37℃温箱中培养24小时。

label: [{"start":36,"end":44,"text":"革兰氏阴性短杆菌","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 4.生化鉴定由SS、麦康凯培养基上挑选红色菌落作涂片，革兰氏染色，镜检为革兰氏阴性短杆菌时，分别接种于普通琼脂培养基、蛋白胨水培养基和各种单糖培养基(葡萄糖、乳糖、麦芽糖、蔗糖、甘露醇)和柠檬酸盐培养基中，37℃温箱中培养24小时，对葡萄糖、乳糖、麦芽糖、甘露醇发酵、产酸、产气，不发酵蔗糖，不利用柠檬酸盐。

label: [{"start":6,"end":14,"text":"腹部皮下有出血点","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":11,"end":14,"text":"出血点","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":26,"end":28,"text":"出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":6,"end":10,"text":"腹部皮下","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":15,"end":19,"text":"实质脏器","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 剖检死鼠可见腹部皮下有出血点，实质脏器呈现不同程度的出血。

label: [{"start":4,"end":5,"text":"肝","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":6,"end":7,"text":"脾","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":11,"end":14,"text":"病原菌","labels":["disease"]},{"start":30,"end":33,"text":"病原菌","labels":["disease"]},{"start":24,"end":27,"text":"病死鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 再无菌取肝、脾组织进行病原菌的分离与鉴定，应该与病死鸡检出的病原菌完全一致。

label: [{"start":12,"end":19,"text":"致病性大肠杆菌","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 6.血清学试验利用购买的致病性大肠杆菌多价血清与所分离的纯培养物进行平板凝集试验加以判断。

label: [{"start":0,"end":9,"text":"加强种鸡场饲养管理","labels":["control"]},{"start":10,"end":16,"text":"兽医卫生防疫","labels":["control"]},{"start":35,"end":39,"text":"健康雏鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 加强种鸡场饲养管理与兽医卫生防疫工作，避免垂直传播与环境污染，保证出售健康雏鸡。

label: [{"start":16,"end":20,"text":"饲养管理","labels":["control"]},{"start":21,"end":25,"text":"防病灭病","labels":["control"]},{"start":55,"end":61,"text":"注意防暑降温","labels":["control"]},{"start":62,"end":68,"text":"定期带鸡消毒","labels":["control"]},{"start":69,"end":77,"text":"改善环境卫生条件","labels":["control"]},{"start":12,"end":15,"text":"成年鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":41,"end":42,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":65,"end":66,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 加强育雏阶段、育成阶段及成年鸡的饲养管理与防病灭病工作，避免原发病与混合感染，增强鸡的体质，在高温、闷热季节应注意防暑降温，定期带鸡消毒，改善环境卫生条件。

label: [{"start":0,"end":4,"text":"预防用药","labels":["control"]}]
text: 预防用药和治疗用药时，可选本菌敏感的药物。

label: [{"start":14,"end":19,"text":"做药敏试验","labels":["control"]}]
text: 在使用药物前，有条件的鸡场应做药敏试验，避免用药不当，延误病情。

label: [{"start":3,"end":8,"text":"用药量要足","labels":["control"]},{"start":11,"end":13,"text":"鸡体","labels":["type"]}]
text: 另外，用药量要足，保证鸡体内药物浓度，避免产生抗药性。

label: [{"start":5,"end":9,"text":"环丙沙星","labels":["drug"]},{"start":10,"end":13,"text":"氟哌酸","labels":["drug"]},{"start":14,"end":19,"text":"磺胺增效剂","labels":["drug"]},{"start":20,"end":24,"text":"庆大霉素","labels":["drug"]},{"start":25,"end":29,"text":"头孢曲松","labels":["drug"]},{"start":30,"end":34,"text":"头孢噻肟","labels":["drug"]},{"start":35,"end":39,"text":"头孢西丁","labels":["drug"]},{"start":40,"end":44,"text":"美罗培南","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 实验证明：环丙沙星、氟哌酸、磺胺增效剂、庆大霉素、头孢曲松、头孢噻肟、头孢西丁、美罗培南等疗效甚好。

label: [{"start":4,"end":10,"text":"鸡大肠杆菌病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":100,"end":107,"text":"大肠杆菌血清型","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 为了控制鸡大肠杆菌病，现已有菌苗供应，但在应用过程中往往效果不佳，主要原因是本菌种类繁多，抗原结构复杂多样，现已发现173个O抗原，74个K抗原，55个H抗原，17个F抗原等，由此而组成了数万个不同的大肠杆菌血清型。

label: [{"start":0,"end":6,"text":"鸡大肠杆菌病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":8,"end":15,"text":"大肠埃希氏杆菌","labels":["disease"]},{"start":18,"end":26,"text":"致病性血清型菌株","labels":["disease"]},{"start":31,"end":39,"text":"常见多发性传染病","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 鸡大肠杆菌病是由大肠埃希氏杆菌的某些致病性血清型菌株引起的一种常见多发性传染病。

label: [{"start":4,"end":13,"text":"大肠杆菌急性败血病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":14,"end":20,"text":"卵黄性腹膜炎","labels":["disease"]},{"start":21,"end":25,"text":"输卵管炎","labels":["disease"]},{"start":26,"end":32,"text":"初生雏鸡脐炎","labels":["disease"]},{"start":33,"end":36,"text":"气囊病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":37,"end":40,"text":"心包炎","labels":["disease"]},{"start":41,"end":45,"text":"全眼球炎","labels":["disease"]},{"start":46,"end":49,"text":"肉芽肿","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 其中包括大肠杆菌急性败血病、卵黄性腹膜炎、输卵管炎、初生雏鸡脐炎、气囊病、心包炎、全眼球炎、肉芽肿等多种疾病。

label: [{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":9,"end":10,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 雏鸡及4月龄以下的鸡易感性高，对养鸡业危害较大。

label: [{"start":0,"end":5,"text":"鸡大肠杆菌","labels":["type"]}]
text: 鸡大肠杆菌在鸡场普遍存在，特别是通风不良、大量积粪鸡舍，在垫料、空气尘埃、污染用具等处环境中染菌最高。

label: [{"start":0,"end":6,"text":"大肠埃希氏菌","labels":["disease"]},{"start":7,"end":9,"text":"粪便","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":23,"end":25,"text":"卵巢","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":26,"end":29,"text":"输卵管","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":43,"end":45,"text":"鸡胚","labels":["type"]},{"start":58,"end":64,"text":"鸡大肠杆菌病","labels":["type"]}]
text: 大肠埃希氏菌随粪便排出，并可污染蛋壳或从感染的卵巢、输卵管等处侵入蛋内，在孵育过程中使鸡胚死亡或出壳后发病和带菌，是鸡大肠杆菌病传播过程中的重要途径。

label: [{"start":0,"end":3,"text":"带菌鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":10,"end":13,"text":"健康鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":14,"end":17,"text":"消化道","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":18,"end":21,"text":"呼吸道","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":36,"end":39,"text":"输精管","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":43,"end":46,"text":"生殖道","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 带菌鸡以水平方式传染健康鸡，消化道、呼吸道为常见的传染门户，交配或污染的输精管等也可经生殖道造成传染。

label: [{"start":0,"end":6,"text":"鸡大肠杆菌病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":20,"end":21,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 鸡大肠杆菌病主要发生于密集化养鸡场，所有鸡不分品种、性别、日龄均对本菌易感。

label: [{"start":3,"end":5,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":111,"end":117,"text":"鸡大肠杆菌病","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 特别是雏鸡发病最多，如污秽、拥挤、潮湿、通风不良的环境，过冷、过热或温差很大的气候，有毒有害气体(氨气或硫化氢等)的长期存在，饲养管理失调，营养不良(维生素的缺乏)以及病原微生物(如支原体及病毒)感染所造成的应激等均可促进鸡大肠杆菌病的发生。

label: [{"start":0,"end":6,"text":"鸡大肠杆菌病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":18,"end":20,"text":"鸡只","labels":["type"]}]
text: 鸡大肠杆菌病没有特征的临床表现，但与鸡只发病日龄、病程长短、受侵害的组织器官及部位、有无继发或混合感染等都有很大关系。

label: [{"start":16,"end":25,"text":"大肠埃希氏菌败血病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":26,"end":32,"text":"初生雏鸡脐炎","labels":["disease"]},{"start":33,"end":36,"text":"气囊病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":37,"end":40,"text":"心包炎","labels":["disease"]},{"start":41,"end":47,"text":"卵黄性腹膜炎","labels":["disease"]},{"start":48,"end":52,"text":"输卵管炎","labels":["disease"]},{"start":53,"end":56,"text":"关节炎","labels":["disease"]},{"start":57,"end":60,"text":"滑膜炎","labels":["disease"]},{"start":61,"end":65,"text":"全眼球炎","labels":["disease"]},{"start":66,"end":68,"text":"脑炎","labels":["disease"]},{"start":69,"end":72,"text":"肉芽肿","labels":["disease"]},{"start":74,"end":79,"text":"肿头综合征","labels":["disease"]},{"start":83,"end":90,"text":"大肠杆菌败血症","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 根据症状和病理变化可分多种病型：大肠埃希氏菌败血病，初生雏鸡脐炎，气囊病，心包炎，卵黄性腹膜炎，输卵管炎，关节炎及滑膜炎，全眼球炎，脑炎，肉芽肿以及肿头综合征等，但以大肠杆菌败血症为多见。

label: [{"start":3,"end":14,"text":"大肠埃希氏菌急性败血症","labels":["disease"]},{"start":15,"end":21,"text":"鸡大肠杆菌病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":24,"end":26,"text":"幼雏","labels":["type"]},{"start":27,"end":29,"text":"成鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":29,"end":33,"text":"急性死亡","labels":["pathology"]}]
text: (1)大肠埃希氏菌急性败血症。鸡大肠杆菌病常引起幼雏或成鸡急性死亡。

label: [{"start":18,"end":24,"text":"肝脏呈铜绿色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":21,"end":24,"text":"铜绿色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":25,"end":29,"text":"胸肌充血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":27,"end":29,"text":"充血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":32,"end":42,"text":"肝脏表面有小白色病灶","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":38,"end":40,"text":"白色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":43,"end":49,"text":"肝脏边缘钝圆","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":50,"end":60,"text":"外有纤维素性白色包膜","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":56,"end":58,"text":"白色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":18,"end":20,"text":"肝脏","labels":["type"]},{"start":25,"end":27,"text":"胸肌","labels":["type"]},{"start":32,"end":34,"text":"肝脏","labels":["type"]},{"start":43,"end":45,"text":"肝脏","labels":["type"]},{"start":40,"end":42,"text":"病灶","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":45,"end":49,"text":"边缘钝圆","labels":["pathology"]}]
text: 剖检时常可闻到特殊臭味，特征性病变是肝脏呈铜绿色和胸肌充血，有的肝脏表面有小白色病灶，肝脏边缘钝圆，外有纤维素性白色包膜。

label: [{"start":4,"end":7,"text":"败血症","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":13,"end":16,"text":"心包炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":17,"end":20,"text":"腹膜炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":21,"end":26,"text":"肠卡他性炎","labels":["pathology"]}]
text: 各器官呈败血症变化，也可见心包炎、腹膜炎、肠卡他性炎等病变。

label: [{"start":3,"end":9,"text":"初生雏鸡脐炎","labels":["disease"]},{"start":12,"end":15,"text":"大肚脐","labels":["disease"]}]
text: (2)初生雏鸡脐炎。俗称大肚脐。

label: [{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"病雏","labels":["type"]},{"start":2,"end":6,"text":"精神沉郁","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":7,"end":9,"text":"少食","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":10,"end":12,"text":"绝食","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":13,"end":17,"text":"腹部胀大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":15,"end":17,"text":"胀大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":18,"end":28,"text":"脐孔及其周围皮肤发红","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":26,"end":28,"text":"发红","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":29,"end":31,"text":"水肿","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":13,"end":15,"text":"腹部","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":18,"end":20,"text":"脐孔","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":24,"end":26,"text":"皮肤","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 病雏精神沉郁，少食或绝食，腹部胀大，脐孔及其周围皮肤发红、水肿。

label: [{"start":2,"end":4,"text":"病雏","labels":["type"]},{"start":21,"end":23,"text":"下痢","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":28,"end":31,"text":"食欲差","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":32,"end":41,"text":"可见排出泥土样粪便","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":42,"end":44,"text":"病雏","labels":["type"]},{"start":39,"end":41,"text":"粪便","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 此种病雏多在1周内死亡或淘汰。另一种表现为下痢，除精神、食欲差，可见排出泥土样粪便，病雏1~2天死亡，死亡不见明显高峰。

label: [{"start":3,"end":9,"text":"卵黄囊不吸收","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":10,"end":14,"text":"囊壁充血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":12,"end":14,"text":"充血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":15,"end":17,"text":"出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":18,"end":24,"text":"内容物黄绿色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":21,"end":24,"text":"黄绿色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":25,"end":27,"text":"黏稠","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":28,"end":32,"text":"稀薄水样","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":33,"end":35,"text":"脓样","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":38,"end":48,"text":"卵黄内为脓血性渗出物","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":49,"end":53,"text":"脐孔开张","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":51,"end":53,"text":"开张","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":54,"end":56,"text":"红肿","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":42,"end":48,"text":"脓血性渗出物","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":3,"end":6,"text":"卵黄囊","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":10,"end":12,"text":"囊壁","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":38,"end":40,"text":"卵黄","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":49,"end":51,"text":"脐孔","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 剖检见卵黄囊不吸收，囊壁充血、出血，内容物黄绿色、黏稠或稀薄水样、脓样，甚至卵黄内为脓血性渗出物，脐孔开张、红肿。

label: [{"start":3,"end":6,"text":"气囊病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":18,"end":20,"text":"幼雏","labels":["type"]},{"start":28,"end":31,"text":"肉仔鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: (3)气囊病。主要发生于3~12周龄幼雏，特别3~8周龄肉仔鸡最为多见。

label: [{"start":0,"end":3,"text":"气囊病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":8,"end":11,"text":"心包炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":12,"end":15,"text":"肝周炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":20,"end":23,"text":"败血症","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":24,"end":27,"text":"眼球炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":28,"end":31,"text":"滑膜炎","labels":["pathology"]}]
text: 气囊病也经常伴有心包炎、肝周炎，偶尔可见败血症、眼球炎和滑膜炎等。

label: [{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":2,"end":6,"text":"表现沉郁","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":7,"end":11,"text":"呼吸困难","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":13,"end":15,"text":"啰音","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":16,"end":18,"text":"喷嚏","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":22,"end":27,"text":"气囊壁增厚","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":25,"end":27,"text":"增厚","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":28,"end":30,"text":"混浊","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":33,"end":41,"text":"有纤维素样渗出物","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":42,"end":57,"text":"囊腔内常含有白色的干酪性渗出物","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":48,"end":50,"text":"白色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":51,"end":57,"text":"干酪性渗出物","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":64,"end":67,"text":"肺水肿","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":65,"end":67,"text":"水肿","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":68,"end":73,"text":"肺呈青绿色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":70,"end":73,"text":"青绿色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":74,"end":76,"text":"液化","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":22,"end":25,"text":"气囊壁","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":42,"end":44,"text":"囊腔","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":64,"end":65,"text":"肺","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":68,"end":69,"text":"肺","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 病鸡表现沉郁，呼吸困难，有啰音和喷嚏等症状。气囊壁增厚、混浊，有的有纤维素样渗出物，囊腔内常含有白色的干酪性渗出物，有的病例只见肺水肿、肺呈青绿色，液化。

label: [{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"肉鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":17,"end":19,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":21,"end":25,"text":"急性经过","labels":["pathology"]}]
text: 肉鸡多在3~7周龄发生，3周龄以下雏鸡多为急性经过。

label: [{"start":0,"end":4,"text":"结膜发炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":2,"end":4,"text":"发炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":5,"end":9,"text":"鸡冠暗紫","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":7,"end":9,"text":"暗紫","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":10,"end":20,"text":"排黄白色或黄绿色稀粪","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":15,"end":18,"text":"黄绿色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":11,"end":14,"text":"黄白色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":24,"end":31,"text":"可闻到特殊臭味","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":32,"end":37,"text":"肝呈铜绿色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":34,"end":37,"text":"铜绿色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"结膜","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":5,"end":7,"text":"鸡冠","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":19,"end":20,"text":"粪","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":32,"end":33,"text":"肝","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 结膜发炎.鸡冠暗紫.排黄白色或黄绿色稀粪，剖检时可闻到特殊臭味，肝呈铜绿色。

label: [{"start":9,"end":15,"text":"鸡大肠杆菌病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":54,"end":64,"text":"致病性血清型大肠杆菌","labels":["disease"]},{"start":70,"end":80,"text":"原发性大肠埃希氏菌病","labels":["disease"]}]
text: (2)实验室确诊。鸡大肠杆菌病确诊须用实验室病原检验方法，排除其他病原感染(病毒、细菌、支原体等),经鉴定为致病性血清型大肠杆菌，方可认为是原发性大肠埃希氏菌病；

label: [{"start":3,"end":8,"text":"原发性疾病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":12,"end":16,"text":"大肠杆菌","labels":["disease"]},{"start":21,"end":29,"text":"继发性大肠杆菌病","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 在其他原发性疾病中分离出大肠杆菌时，应视为继发性大肠杆菌病。

label: [{"start":2,"end":8,"text":"鸡大肠杆菌病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":25,"end":31,"text":"鸡大肠杆菌病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":37,"end":47,"text":"加强对鸡群的饲养管理","labels":["control"]},{"start":40,"end":42,"text":"鸡群","labels":["type"]}]
text: 鉴于鸡大肠杆菌病的发生与外界各种应激因素有关，预防鸡大肠杆菌病首先是在平时加强对鸡群的饲养管理。另外，应搞好常见多发疾病的预防工作。

label: [{"start":3,"end":7,"text":"疫苗接种","labels":["control"]},{"start":3,"end":5,"text":"疫苗","labels":["drug"]},{"start":14,"end":18,"text":"肌内注射","labels":["control"]},{"start":18,"end":32,"text":"鸡大肠杆菌多价油乳剂灭活疫苗","labels":["drug"]}]
text: (1)疫苗接种。10日龄左右肌内注射鸡大肠杆菌多价油乳剂灭活疫苗，每只0.5mL。

label: [{"start":15,"end":27,"text":"鸡舍和用具要经常清洗消毒","labels":["control"]}]
text: (2)预防措施。防止种蛋传播，鸡舍和用具要经常清洗消毒。

label: [{"start":11,"end":15,"text":"药物治疗","labels":["control"]},{"start":4,"end":7,"text":"抗生素","labels":["drug"]},{"start":8,"end":13,"text":"磺胺类药物","labels":["drug"]},{"start":20,"end":24,"text":"庆大霉素","labels":["drug"]},{"start":25,"end":28,"text":"氯霉素","labels":["drug"]},{"start":29,"end":33,"text":"卡那霉素","labels":["drug"]},{"start":34,"end":37,"text":"链霉素","labels":["drug"]},{"start":38,"end":41,"text":"土霉素","labels":["drug"]},{"start":42,"end":47,"text":"复方新诺明","labels":["drug"]}]
text: (3)用抗生素或磺胺类药物治疗。常用的有庆大霉素、氯霉素、卡那霉素、链霉素、土霉素、复方新诺明等。但用药时要注意观察疗效，疗效不显著及时换药。

label: [{"start":8,"end":12,"text":"注意通风","labels":["control"]},{"start":24,"end":30,"text":"及时清理粪便","labels":["control"]},{"start":31,"end":40,"text":"注意饲料品质及营养","labels":["control"]},{"start":28,"end":30,"text":"粪便","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: (4)加强管理。注意通风、温度、湿度和饲养密度，及时清理粪便，注意饲料品质及营养。

label: [{"start":3,"end":9,"text":"鸡大肠杆菌病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":29,"end":35,"text":"慢性呼吸道病","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 另外，鸡大肠杆菌病也常继发于其他疫病发生的过程中，特别是在慢性呼吸道病时，故也应注意有效地控制鸡场的常见病和多发病。
